text.tspan: type ProcStates is (READY, STARTED; X, Y, Z, FINISHED);
when INI => aini ; ProcSM; synchState := A;
when A => at1; ProcSM; synchState := B;
when B => at2; ProcSM; synchstate := B;
when X => if gt3 then at3; procState := Y;
elsif gt4 then at4; procState := Z;
"t2 has some action that enables t2a"
but how do we know where to put the
Do we look for the enabling transition, and call there?
